lom:description.lom:string:
Careers in Science and Engineering offers guidance to students on planning careers--particularly careers in nonacademic settings--and discusses how to obtain the education and skills necessary to attain their career goals. Profiles of science and engineering professionals illustrate a variety of career paths.
Authors: National Academy of Sciences, National Academy of Engineering, and Institute of Medicine

lom:title.lom:string: Careers in Science and Engineering: A Student Planning Guide to Grad School and Beyond (1996)
